name: Building a Simple Directive
description: In this lesson you will learn how to write a simple directive that displays a gravatar image for an email address.

name: Scope based Messaging
description: In this lesson we are going to cover how to use the messaging methods provided by the Scope object to communicate between AngularJS components.

name: Service based Messaging
description: In this lesson we are going to cover how to use a service to communicate between AngularJS components.

name: Pub/Sub based Messaging
description: In this lesson we are going to cover how to use the publish-subscribe design pattern to communicate between AngularJS components.

name: Unit Testing Basics
description: In this lesson you will learn the basics of writing unit tests for AngularJS components.
